reports.title: Transaction count last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= t.timestamp
RETURN count(*) AS result

reports.title: Volume flow in million USD last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= t.timestamp
RETURN sum(t.flowUSD) / 1000000 AS result

reports.title: Transactions count for the last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= t.timestamp
WITH t.timestamp.year AS year, t.timestamp.day AS day, t.timestamp.month AS month, t.timestamp.hour AS hour, count(*) AS y
RETURN datetime({year:year, month:month, day:day, hour:hour}) AS x, y

reports.title: Transaction volume flow in million USD for the last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= t.timestamp
WITH t.timestamp.year AS year, t.timestamp.day AS day, t.timestamp.month AS month, t.timestamp.hour AS hour, sum(t.flowUSD) AS y
RETURN datetime({year:year, month:month, day:day, hour:hour}) AS x, y / 1000000

reports.title: Largest transactions by flow within last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= t.timestamp
RETURN t.hash AS transactionHash, t.flowUSD AS valueInUSD, t.flowBTC AS valueInBTC, t.timestamp AS date
ORDER BY valueInBTC DESC LIMIT 100

reports.title: Addresses with the highest incoming flow within last 24 hours
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Address)
// incoming flow
MATCH (a)<-[in:SENT]-(it:Transaction)<-[inback:SENT]-(inbackAddress)
WHERE datetime() - duration({hours:24}) <= it.timestamp
WITH a, collect(distinct in) AS incomingTransactions, collect(distinct CASE WHEN inbackAddress = a THEN inback END) AS returnedChange
WITH a, apoc.coll.sum([t in incomingTransactions | t.valueUSD]) AS incomingTotal, apoc.coll.sum([t in returnedChange | t.valueUSD]) AS returnedTotal
WITH a, coalesce(incomingTotal,0.0) - coalesce(returnedTotal,0.0) AS incomingFlowUSD
ORDER BY incomingFlowUSD DESC
LIMIT 100
RETURN a.id AS address, incomingFlowUSD

reports.title: Select
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Address`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`id`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`id` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Total outgoing volume in USD
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Address)
WHERE a.id = $neodash_address_id
// outgoing flow
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[out:SENT]->(ot:Transaction)-[outback:SENT]->(outbackAddress)
WITH a, collect(distinct out) AS outgoingTransactions, collect(distinct CASE WHEN outbackAddress = a THEN outback END) AS returnedChange
WITH a, apoc.coll.sum([t in outgoingTransactions | t.valueUSD]) AS outgoingTotal, apoc.coll.sum([t in returnedChange | t.valueUSD]) AS returnedTotal
WITH a, coalesce(outgoingTotal,0.0) - coalesce(returnedTotal,0.0) AS outgoingFlowUSD
RETURN outgoingFlowUSD

reports.title: Total incoming volume in USD
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Address)
WHERE a.id = $neodash_address_id
// outgoing flow
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)<-[in:SENT]-(it:Transaction)<-[inback:SENT]-(inbackAddress)
WITH a, collect(distinct in) AS outgoingTransactions, collect(distinct CASE WHEN inbackAddress = a THEN inback END) AS returnedChange
WITH a, apoc.coll.sum([t in outgoingTransactions | t.valueUSD]) AS incomingTotal, apoc.coll.sum([t in returnedChange | t.valueUSD]) AS returnedTotal
WITH a, coalesce(incomingTotal,0.0) - coalesce(returnedTotal,0.0) AS incomingFlowUSD
RETURN incomingFlowUSD

reports.title: Largest outgoing transactions
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Address)-[r:SENT]->(t:Transaction)
WHERE a.id = $neodash_address_id
RETURN t.hash AS transactionHash, r.valueUSD AS outgoingUSD,r.valueBTC AS outgoingBTC, t.timestamp AS date
ORDER BY outgoingUSD DESC
LIMIT 100

reports.title: Largest incoming transactions
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Address)<-[r:SENT]-(t:Transaction)
WHERE a.id = $neodash_address_id
RETURN t.hash AS transactionHash, r.valueUSD AS incomingUSD,r.valueBTC AS incomingBTC, t.timestamp AS date
ORDER BY incomingUSD DESC
LIMIT 100

MATCH (n:`Transaction`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`hash`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`hash` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Graph visualization
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)
WHERE t.hash = $neodash_transaction_hash
MATCH p=(t)-[:SENT]-()
RETURN p

reports.title: Inputs of the transaction
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)<-[r:SENT]-(a)
WHERE t.hash = $neodash_transaction_hash
RETURN a.id AS address, r.valueUSD AS valueUSD, r.valueBTC AS valueBTC
ORDER BY valueUSD DESC

reports.title: Outputs of the transaction
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Transaction)-[r:SENT]->(a)
WHERE t.hash = $neodash_transaction_hash
RETURN a.id AS address, r.valueUSD AS valueUSD, r.valueBTC AS valueBTC
ORDER BY valueUSD DESC
